content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":95391,"originalJapaneseLine":"　責は全て私一人で引き受けるって言ったし！","translatedEnglishLine":"I said I'd take full responsibility all by myself!"},{"lineNumber":95392,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言ってたが本気で押しつける気かお前……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You said that, but are you seriously trying to shove it all onto me...?"},{"lineNumber":95393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あうあう、押さないでぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, au-au, don't push me...!"},{"lineNumber":95394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっすがシーラ様！　上司の鏡！","translatedEnglishLine":"As expected of Lady Sheila! A model boss!"},{"lineNumber":95395,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最高の女！　よっ、大統領！","translatedEnglishLine":"The greatest woman! Hail, Madam President!"},{"lineNumber":95396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃ、そゆことでー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, that's settled then..."},{"lineNumber":95397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐえーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ughh!"},{"lineNumber":95398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、今日はシーラとペルエレの","translatedEnglishLine":"Gahaha, today it's a pseudo-sister bowl of Sheila and Peruele!"},{"lineNumber":95399,"originalJapaneseLine":"　疑似姉妹丼だなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a pseudo-sisters affair!"},{"lineNumber":95400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あうあう……あうあう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Au-au... au-au..."},{"lineNumber":95401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやーー！　離してーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nooo! Let gooo!"},{"lineNumber":95402,"originalJapaneseLine":"結果、ペルエレはランスにこっぴどく犯された。","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result, Peruele was mercilessly violated by Rance."},{"lineNumber":95403,"originalJapaneseLine":"ペルエレ・カレット。","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruele Carret."},{"lineNumber":95404,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン初代大統領の秘書。","translatedEnglishLine":"Secretary to the first president of Helman."},{"lineNumber":95405,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女の秘書としての仕事は膨大である。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her work as secretary is enormous."},{"lineNumber":95406,"originalJapaneseLine":"まず、朝。","translatedEnglishLine":"First, in the morning."},{"lineNumber":95407,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰よりも早く起きて大統領の簡単な朝食の用意に、","translatedEnglishLine":"She wakes earlier than anyone else to prepare the president's simple breakfast,"},{"lineNumber":95408,"originalJapaneseLine":"就業前に前日に溜まった書類の整理から始まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and before work starts, she begins by sorting through the documents piled up from the day before."},{"lineNumber":95409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ〜、おはよー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fwaa~ Good morning...\""},{"lineNumber":95410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、おはよう、ペルエレ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, good morning, Peruele."},{"lineNumber":95411,"originalJapaneseLine":"　朝ご飯どうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What would you like for breakfast?\""},{"lineNumber":95412,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、食べる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I'll eat...\""},{"lineNumber":95413,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コーヒー？　紅茶？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Coffee? Tea?"},{"lineNumber":95414,"originalJapaneseLine":"　緑茶もあるけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have green tea too...\""},{"lineNumber":95415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー、今朝はコーヒー、かな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I think I'll have coffee this morning...\""},{"lineNumber":95416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay.\""},{"lineNumber":95417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　昨日の書類ってどこ行ったの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Where did the documents from yesterday go?\""},{"lineNumber":95418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、さっき整理しておいた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I sorted them earlier.\""},{"lineNumber":95419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー、ご苦労。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, good work."},{"lineNumber":95420,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、砂糖は三つね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, three sugars, please.\""},{"lineNumber":95421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay.\""},{"lineNumber":95422,"originalJapaneseLine":"仕事が始まると、大統領宛の書類が","translatedEnglishLine":"As work begins, documents addressed to the president"},{"lineNumber":95423,"originalJapaneseLine":"次から次へと送られて膨大になる。","translatedEnglishLine":"arrive one after another in great numbers."},{"lineNumber":95424,"originalJapaneseLine":"大統領がまともな職務を送れているのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The president being able to perform proper duties is"},{"lineNumber":95425,"originalJapaneseLine":"側に仕える優秀な秘書あってのことである。","translatedEnglishLine":"thanks to the presence of a competent secretary by their side."},{"lineNumber":95426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ〜〜〜……ねむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fwaa~~~... sleepy...\""},{"lineNumber":95427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「少し眠る？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you want to sleep a bit?\""},{"lineNumber":95428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうする。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will."},{"lineNumber":95429,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたは仕事？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you working?\""},{"lineNumber":95430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、休んでる暇はもうちょっとなさそう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, it looks like I don't have time to rest just yet.\""},{"lineNumber":95431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、頑張ってね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Do your best.\""},{"lineNumber":95432,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah!\""},{"lineNumber":95433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さぁ〜て、私はもう一眠り……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright then, I'll take another nap...\""},{"lineNumber":95434,"originalJapaneseLine":"秘書といえど全ての仕事をこなすわけではない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Even as a secretary, she does not handle every single task."},{"lineNumber":95435,"originalJapaneseLine":"時には心を鬼として大統領に職務を渡し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes, steeling her heart, she delegates duties to the president,"},{"lineNumber":95436,"originalJapaneseLine":"政治の現状をより深く伝えることも行う。","translatedEnglishLine":"and also conveys the political situation more deeply."},{"lineNumber":95437,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは特に、大統領と深く通じ合った","translatedEnglishLine":"This is especially a task that only an excellent secretary"},{"lineNumber":95438,"originalJapaneseLine":"優秀な秘書にしか出来ない仕事と言え――","translatedEnglishLine":"who is deeply connected to the president can perform—"},{"lineNumber":95439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":95440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、と思ったけど私も","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I thought so, but I also...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 責は全て私一人で引き受けるって言ったし！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I said I'd take full responsibility all by myself!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言ってたが本気で押しつける気かお前……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said that, but are you seriously trying to shove it all onto me...?
Ah, au-au, don't push me...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっすがシーラ様！　上司の鏡！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As expected of Lady Sheila! A model boss!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最高の女！　よっ、大統領！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The greatest woman! Hail, Madam President!
Well, that's settled then...
Ughh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、今日はシーラとペルエレの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahaha, today it's a pseudo-sister bowl of Sheila and Peruele!
It's a pseudo-sisters affair!
Au-au... au-au...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやーー！　離してーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nooo! Let gooo!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果、ペルエレはランスにこっぴどく犯された。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a result, Peruele was mercilessly violated by Rance.
Peruele Carret.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン初代大統領の秘書。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Secretary to the first president of Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女の秘書としての仕事は膨大である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her work as secretary is enormous.
First, in the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰よりも早く起きて大統領の簡単な朝食の用意に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She wakes earlier than anyone else to prepare the president's simple breakfast,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 就業前に前日に溜まった書類の整理から始まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and before work starts, she begins by sorting through the documents piled up from the day before.
"Fwaa~ Good morning..."
"Ah, good morning, Peruele.
What would you like for breakfast?"
"Yeah, I'll eat..."
"Coffee? Tea?
We have green tea too..."
"Hmm, I think I'll have coffee this morning..."
"Okay."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　昨日の書類ってどこ行ったの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Where did the documents from yesterday go?"
"Ah, I sorted them earlier."
"Hmm, good work.
Oh, three sugars, please."
"Okay."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仕事が始まると、大統領宛の書類が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As work begins, documents addressed to the president

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次から次へと送られて膨大になる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: arrive one after another in great numbers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領がまともな職務を送れているのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The president being able to perform proper duties is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側に仕える優秀な秘書あってのことである。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thanks to the presence of a competent secretary by their side.
"Fwaa~~~... sleepy..."
"Do you want to sleep a bit?"
"I will.
Are you working?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、休んでる暇はもうちょっとなさそう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, it looks like I don't have time to rest just yet."
"D-Do your best."
"Yeah!"
"Alright then, I'll take another nap..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘書といえど全ての仕事をこなすわけではない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even as a secretary, she does not handle every single task.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には心を鬼として大統領に職務を渡し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, steeling her heart, she delegates duties to the president,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政治の現状をより深く伝えることも行う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also conveys the political situation more deeply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは特に、大統領と深く通じ合った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is especially a task that only an excellent secretary

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優秀な秘書にしか出来ない仕事と言え――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who is deeply connected to the president can perform—
"Ah, I thought so, but I also..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
